titleStmt.title: Captaine Audley Marvin's speech delivered in the upper house to the Lords in Parliament May 24, 1641 concerning the iudicature of the high court of Parliament.
Speech delivered in the Upper House to the Lords in Parliament May 24, 1641
titleStmt.author: Mervyn, Audley, Sir, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and faded, with loss of text.
